## Installation

You can install the development version from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

```{r eval = FALSE}
# install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("FRBCesab/authoR")
```

Then you can attach the package `authoR`:

```{r eval = FALSE}

```
